remarks:
Closure law for multiplication in the real subfield of complex numbers. Axiom 7 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axmulrcl .  Proofs should normally use ~ remulcl instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.) 

---

 Closure law for multiplication in the real subfield of complex numbers. Axiom for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axmulrcl . Proofs should normally use ~ remulcl instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
statement: ax-mulrcl $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( A x. B ) e. RR ) $.
